body: Once again, I cannot control my urge to get naked.  I had no panties on when I did my normal school announcement in front of the whole student body.  It was exciting that my vagina was exposed at the time and no one knew about it.  My first exhibition act was in the park where the risks were higher, but now I got naked on the school roof.  It was more controlled and safe because I had the keys to lock myself out.  I did not expect the wind to blow my clothes away.  Walking around naked in school was so thrilling that it made my exhibition urges worse (or better?).
